item.title: Owncast v0.1.0 Retrospective - Redesign
item.description: With Owncast v0.1.0 in a bug fixing and early testing phase now, I thought I’d write some blog posts about what it’s been like to work on the project. A lot of projects don’t go into depth about how the sausage is made, but I still think people are interested in what’s going on even though they don’t go out of their way to ask.
